response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to offer it to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only the current market conditions but also the unique attributes and potential of the product, which I believe aligns closely with your expectations and needs. I am confident that this offer presents an excellent balance between value and cost, providing you with the best possible deal while ensuring a fair return for the product. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together and making this transaction a mutually beneficial endeavor.", "product_price": 1200000}
